mapper.insert: insert into user_tb(user_email, password, pic, username, tel, grade, gubun, created_at) values(#{userEmail}, #{password}, #{pic}, #{username}, #{tel}, #{grade}, #{gubun}, now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_tb where user_email = #{userEmail}
select * from user_tb where user_email = #{userEmail} and password = #{password}
mapper.update: update user_tb set pic=#{uploadFileName}, username=#{username}, password=#{password1}, tel=#{tel} where id=#{id}
